summary: A farm girl girl runs away from her sexually abusive father and ends up in Los Angeles. Hippies, LSD, prostitution, lesbianism, a threesome, and a meeting with a satanic cult soon follow.
cast: Edward Blessington|K.W. Christian|Uschi Digard|Lynn Harris|Carol Hill|Michael Donovan O'Donnell|Jeffrey Sands|Ray Sebastian|Donna Stanley|Allan Warnick|Kipp Whitman|Donna Young|Bambi Allen|Jack King|Phyllis Stengel
title: Wild Honey
